inclusion.criterion: Dorsalis pedis pulse in both feet
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In risk group 2 or 3 using the diabetic foot risk classification system as specified by the International Working Group on the Diabetic Foot.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Operating cell phone or a caregiver with an operating cell phone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current ulcers or open amputation sites
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has itchy foot with localized scaling and maceration, but no pus or tearing. Physical exam and lab studies were normal otherwise.
